channel.title: Eclipse Question
channel.description:
If I'm running a server through eclipse and i wanna put it online but the client basically won't run without eclipse but the server/source is fine is it possible to run a rsps through eclipse so other people can still connect the same way as if I wasn't using eclipse?
Sorry if this is a bit confusing but, mainly just wondering if you can have an online rsps through eclipse if so.... how?

item.title: Eclipse Question
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

No just trying to see if your able to use eclipse to run rsps online basically hosting the rsps like you would normally and through portforwarding.

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse Question
item.dc:creator: @twobrosplay twobrosplay
item.description:
@twobrosplay wrote:

Your talking about (dementhium) correct? (Nexon-world 639)?
